meaning_str.bing:
v. 保证；保障；担保；确保
n. 保证；担保；抵押品；保证金
网络. 保证书；担保物；保修单

保证；担保；抵押品；保证金

担保；保证；保证书；保用证书；承诺；保修单；确保；保障；凭证；担保物；保证金
保证；保障；担保；确保；承诺；提供（产品）保修单（免费掉换或修理有问题的产品）；为（产品、服务等）提供保证；保用（产品）；承诺对…负法律责任

1.en: The company has established a strict quality guarantee system and obtained a few related quality guarantee certifications as well.
1.cn: 沈阳三浦汽车电子有限公司建立了严格的质量保证体系，已经先后通过了相关体系认证。

2.en: I'm going to take you to see a spectacle. I guarantee you've never seen it before. Come with me.
2.cn: 我今天要带你去看一个奇观。而且保证你原来肯定没见过。跟我走吧。

3.en: No relationship comes with a guarantee of happiness, so the best that you can do is to be honest, believe in yourself and follow your heart.
3.cn: 没有感情能够获得幸福的保证，所以你最好就是保持真诚，相信你自己，听从自己内心的召唤。

0.en: Oh, being excited isn't a guarantee of anything.
0.cn: 兴奋也不能保证什么啊。

1.en: But your business card says you guarantee next-day delivery. Oh, you can't guarantee that guarantee?
1.cn: 但你们的名片上写着"保证第二天送货"啊，你不能保证名片上的"保证"吗？

2.en: We can't guarantee her safety. You'll never be able to guarantee my safety. I wanna go.
2.cn: 我们无法保证她的安全。你永远无法保证我的安全，我要去。

3.en: We can guarantee the immigration ban will be lifted in the next week.
3.cn: 我们可以保证移民禁令下星期就会取消。

4.en: If I do so, I have no guarantee that you will not destroy the Enterprise.
4.cn: 要我关闭，除非你保证你不会摧毁企业号。

5.en: And for the rest of you guys, I guarantee they will never send you back up here again.
5.cn: 但对其他人来说, 我保证他们不会再把你们送到太空了。

6.en: And if I could guarantee you that you'd get away with it. Would you kill him? In a heartbeat.
6.cn: 还能保证事后你能全身而退。你会杀了他吗？毫不犹豫。

7.en: And if you refuse to learn that, I guarantee you, you guys will not become the best person you can be.
7.cn: 如果你拒绝学习历史，我保证你们一定无法做到最好的自己。

8.en: We took a path, a difficult one, because we had no guarantee where it was going to lead us.
8.cn: 我们走上了一条路，一条艰难的路，因为完全无法保证这条路会通往何方。

9.en: I can put this guy in your lap. You can do whatever you want and I guarantee you you'll get away with it.
9.cn: 我能把这人带到你脚下，任你处置，我还能保证你全身而退。

10.en: Tactically, we need more time. I can't guarantee that we can track them down in less than 24 hours.
10.cn: 战术上我们需要更多时间，我无法保证我们24小时内可以追踪到他们。

11.en: All the middle class in this country want is a chance. No guarantee, just a chance. Americans want to work.
11.cn: 全美的中产阶级需要的就是这样的机会。不是毫无意义的保证，而是切切实实的机会。

12.en: One of the handlers nearly lost an arm. The others threatened to quit if I couldn't guarantee their safety.
12.cn: 有一位工作人员差点失去他的胳膊，其他人威胁说如果我不能保证他们的安全就辞职。

13.en: I know the nicknames. I've watched Kojak. I guarantee that low-life cousin of Gloria's stashed this up there.
13.cn: 我知道外号，我看过《侦探科杰克》。我保证是歌洛莉亚的那个人渣表亲藏在这里的。

14.en: No. We are committing genetic fraud. There's no guarantee that our sperm is going to generate high-IQ offspring.
14.cn: 不是的，我们这是在犯基因欺诈罪，我们的精子并不能保证将来就能生出高智商的后代。

15.en: If he was a regular contractor carpenter guy, I guarantee you would not be able to fix the damage that I do as quickly.
15.cn: 如果他只是个普通的木工，我敢跟你保证，他绝不可能修好我这么快速造成的破坏。

16.en: It's time for us to invest in educational opportunity, to guarantee that we have the most highly skilled workforce in the world.
16.cn: 我们应该加大教育领域投资，让国民接受良好教育，保证我们拥有全世界最优秀的劳动力队伍。

17.en: But I can't guarantee I won't think about it. It's what I do, I think about things. It's my nature. Fine. You can think. Fair enough.
17.cn: 但我不能保证我不会去想，这就是我做的事，我会去想事情，这是我的天性。好吧，你可以想。很好。

18.en: Okay, I guarantee you guys that what historians will say about us is that we're a society that spent a lot of time with a click or a like or a comment.
18.cn: 好了，我跟你们保证历史学家们会认为我们这个社会的人会花很多时间去点击，点赞，或者评论。

19.en: If what's between my legs had a hand on it, I guarantee I could've landed this ship with it. Peter. We almost died because of your arrogance.
19.cn: 要是我下半身有只手的话，我都可以保证用那只手让我们安全着陆。彼得。因为你的不自量力我们差点都死了。
